text:
Oh, are you free~?
Then why not come over to my place~?

At Mei-chan's place, they have a kotatsu.
Once you're under it, you won't want to leave.

Even though I want to play a lot,
I end up not wanting to do anything.

Hey, let's play games under the kotatsuâ™ª How about,
a game of "How long can you stay without leaving"~?

I don't know!
So let's start by figuring it out together~
